RumorFact.Text: I heard about some sort of dangerous Bramble node in Briar's Hollow.
Apparently the Nomai and Aliens decided that this node was too dangerous, and needed to be destroyed.
A Dree named Ditylum was charged with poisoning some dangerous node.
A mount on the node is apparently for delivering a lethal toxin, a task that a Dree named Ditylum was charged with.
Going into the node seems to end the loop instantly, although I can see some strange creature turn towards me just before my vision fades.
When I fire my scout into the node, it fails to acknowledge any recall requests for several seconds.

ExploreFact.Text: I was able to kill the node with the toxin injector. When I did so, a creature popped out and swam away, towards the center of Briar's Hollow.

RumorFact.Text: One of the Nomai wrote that a strange creature led him through the recursive node at the center of Briar's Hollow into some sort of enclosed space, after which he turned back to not get lost.
The Nomai theorized that this had something to do with how the entrances to the recursive node line up with the entrances to Briar’s Hollow.

ExploreFact.Text: I was able to find my way into a strange, enclosed space. There seems to be a Bramble node tucked away inside.

RumorFact.Text: Supposedly, there is a node at the center of Briar’s Hollow that leads into itself.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a node at the center of Briar’s Hollow that leads recursively into itself.
I was able to pick up an amplified ambience signal on the “Natural Phenomena” frequency.
